title: Rocky
description: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

title: Taxi Driver
description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

title: Network
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

title: All the President's Men
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Nixon's resignation.

title: Carrie
description: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

title: The Omen
description: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

title: Marathon Man
description: A history student is caught in the middle of a conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.

title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
description: A Missouri farmer joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

title: Logan's Run
description: An idyllic sci-fi future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of thirty.

title: Assault on Precinct 13
description: A highway patrol officer and two criminals must defend a police precinct against an army of street gang members.

title: The Man Who Fell to Earth
description: An alien must pose as a human to save his dying planet, but a woman and a teacher of sorts complicate the mission.

title: King Kong
description: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant ape.

title: A Star Is Born
description: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

title: The Bad News Bears
description: An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

title: Silver Streak
description: A book editor on a train ride from Los Angeles to Chicago thinks he sees a murder, but no one believes him.

title: Family Plot
description: A phony psychic and her con artist boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while on the trail of a missing heir in California.

title: The Shootist
description: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

title: Seven Beauties
description: Pasqualino, an Italian everyman, deserts the army during WWII and is captured by the Germans and sent to a concentration camp, where he does anything to survive.

title: Bound for Glory
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Song Score and Its Adaptation or Best Adaptation Score
description: The early life of Woody Guthrie as a vagabond folk singer.

title: Face to Face
description: A psychiatrist suffers a profound breakdown and drifts between reality and a hallucinatory dream world.
The epic story of a friendship between two men from different classes in Italy, spanning the early 20th century to the end of World War II.

title: The Tenant
description: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

title: Voyage of the Damned
description: The tragic 1939 voyage of the SS St. Louis carrying Jewish refugees from Germany to Cuba, where they are denied entry and eventually returned to Europe.

title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
description: Charles Dreyfus escapes from the mental asylum and tries to kill Chief Inspector Jacques Clouseau. He doesn't succeed at first, so he takes on a whole new strategy.

title: The Enforcer
description: San Francisco Inspector Harry Callahan must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans.

title: Silent Movie
description: A film director and his strange friends struggle to produce the first major silent feature film in forty years.

title: Murder by Death
description: Five famous literary and film detectives are invited to a remote mansion to solve a murder, but they soon find themselves trying to solve a mystery within a mystery.

title: Midway
description: A dramatization of the battle that was a turning point of the Pacific Theater of World War II.

title: Robin and Marian
description: Robin Hood, aging and none too wise, returns from the Crusades to woo and win Maid Marian one last time.

title: Freaky Friday
description: A mother and daughter find their personalities switched and have to live each other's lives on a strange Friday.

title: Bugsy Malone
description: A gangster movie where all the gangsters are children. Instead of real bullets they use "splurge guns" that cover the victim in cream.

title: The Missouri Breaks
description: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

title: The Front
description: In 1953, a cashier poses as a writer for blacklisted authors to get their work published, but the injustice around him pushes him to take a stand.

title: Harlan County U.S.A.
description: A documentary covering the "Brookside Strike", an effort of 180 coal miners and their wives against the Duke Power Company-owned Eastover Coal Company's Brookside Mine and Prep Plant in Harlan County, southeast Kentucky in 1973.

title: In the Realm of the Senses
description: A servant and her employer begin a torrid affair that turns into a sexual obsession.

title: Mr. Klein
description: In Nazi-occupied Paris, an art dealer is mistaken for a Jew of the same name and must unravel the mystery of his doppelgänger to save himself.

title: The Killing of a Chinese Bookie
description: A Los Angeles strip club owner is forced to commit a murder in order to pay off his gambling debts.

title: Mikey and Nicky
description: A small-time bookie who stole money from a mob boss is in hiding and calls on his childhood friend to help him evade the hitman.

title: Fellini's Casanova
description: Giacomo Casanova, a libertine, is jailed, escapes, and has many sexual adventures.

title: Cousin Cousine
description: Two cousins by marriage, both unhappy in their marital lives, meet at a wedding and develop a deep friendship that eventually turns into romance.

title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
description: A 13-year-old girl living alone in a house hides a dark secret from her landlady and other prying adults.

title: Alice, Sweet Alice
description: After her sister is murdered during her First Communion, a young girl becomes the prime suspect in a series of stabbings.

title: Who Can Kill a Child?
description: A couple on vacation arrive at a remote island where they find it is inhabited solely by children.

title: Burnt Offerings
description: A family moves into a large old Victorian house to take care of it for the summer, but they soon begin to suspect that the house is alive and evil.

title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
description: In 1946, a Texas Ranger hunts for a hooded serial killer terrorizing the residents of a small town on the Texas-Arkansas border.

title: Car Wash
description: A day in the life of a close-knit group of employees and the strange customers they encounter at a Los Angeles car wash.

title: Leadbelly
description: The life of legendary blues singer Huddie Ledbetter, better known as Leadbelly, from his youth in the brothels of Louisiana to his time in prison and eventual discovery by folklorist John Lomax.

title: The Last Tycoon
description: A Hollywood studio executive slowly works himself to death.

title: Black and White in Color
description: French colonists in Africa, at war with their German neighbors, decide to attack a local German outpost with the help of the local indigenous population.

title: Obsession
description: A wealthy New Orleans businessman becomes obsessed with a young woman who resembles his long-dead wife.
